message.pattern: <@DATE_TIME_SYSLOG:datetime@> <@WORD:device@> <@REGEXP("logd: [\d+]: WARN: Consider setting .+ for maximum supportability"):msg@>
<@DATE_TIME_SYSLOG:datetime@> <@WORD:device@> <@REGEXP("logd: [\d+]: info: G_main_add_SignalHandler: Added signal handler for signal .+"):msg@>
<@DATE_TIME_SYSLOG:datetime@> <@WORD:device@> <@REGEXP("logd: [\d+]: WARN: Core dumps could be lost if multiple dumps occur."):msg@>
<@DATE_TIME_SYSLOG:datetime@> <@WORD:device@> <@REGEXP("logd: [\d+]: info: logd started with default configuration."):msg@>
